title: The Passage
description: The Passage of souls connected forever as seen in the eyes but the body has changed…Taryn’s windfall of good fortune keeps coming in masses. Everything is falling into place. There is though one piece that doesn’t quite fit. Her present love seems to be perfect in so many ways . . . but she is constantly reminded of one love that she was taken from so long ago. She often wishes The Passage would allow her to be with him just to feel his touch once more, but TIME hasn’t allowed her that. The Crossing Series (The Knot Hole, The Passage and The Muse) will take you on a romantic journey from many years past to the present. From friends to family to love ones, Taryn will encounter so many people that she once knew and their souls have returned to those again surrounding her.Being extremely business savoy Taryn will put many of her dreams and notions into a forward motion. But who will be the one next to her in all of her accomplishments will it be someone in the present has come from the past?
author: Renee Lee Fisher
